thread.title_full: Loved it. - Review of Emeraude Louvre Montana Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DanceGroupie
title: Loved it.
text:
Across the street from the Tuilleries. Really sweet little place with very nice and helpful staff ; wonderful breakfast included. Location is superb and within walking distance to all the greatest sites. HIghly recommend for couples. No restaurant, but there are a million other places to find food nearby.
Room Tip: The rooms are small, but the bathroom is large. We were offered a larger room for a price. Not sure... See more room tips
